tool_description: Generates creative content ideas based on trending topics, target audience interests, and specified content formats using AI-powered ideation algorithms.

topics.description: Topics or themes to generate content ideas around

content_format.description: Desired content format (video, image, carousel, story, reel, blog, infographic)

creativity_level.description: Level of creativity desired (conservative, moderate, creative, experimental)

brand_tone.description: Brand voice and tone (professional, casual, humorous, inspirational, educational)

error_messages: Empty topics array: Provide at least one topic for idea generation.
Too many topics: Maximum 5 topics allowed for focused idea generation.
Invalid content format: Use one of [video, image, carousel, story, reel, blog, infographic].
Invalid creativity level: Use one of [conservative, moderate, creative, experimental].
Invalid brand tone: Use one of [professional, casual, humorous, inspirational, educational].
Invalid ideas count: Must be between 5 and 25.
Topic too vague: Provide more specific topics for better idea generation.
usage: Provide topics array, content_format, and target_audience. Optionally specify creativity_level, brand_tone, and ideas_count. Returns creative content ideas with execution suggestions.

content_ideas.description: Generated content idea titles and concepts

execution_suggestions.description: Practical execution suggestions for each content idea

estimated_engagement.description: Estimated engagement potential (low, medium, high) for each idea

required_resources.description: Resources needed to execute each content idea
